Text: you could have stated that this is the Russian version.
can we change the language to English by any chance on this

@oykas
if you understand russian, then u can give it a try :)

For english language, go to the regedit HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Nero\Nero 9\Shared and there in the right side create a new string value with name "FamilyLanguage" and value "ENG" both of them without quotes. I hope help you this. Good luck!
